sources.title: Life Ain't Like The Movies | Full Movie | Award Winning Drama | Paul Bates | Cynda Williams
sources.description:
Life Ain't Like the Movies is a coming of age story about an awkward black teen. He learns about love, family, and tragedy while going to high school.
2021.  Stars: Cynda Williams, Paul Bates, Victoria Nuckles

metadata.Plot: The coming age story of a 16 year old quirky black teen. The film follows him as he goes through high school. He deals with various issues like love, death, bullies, and social awkwardness.
metadata.Actors: Paul Bates, Cynda Williams, Grace Aubry
